name: vs rhys moon v2 and 1
description:
the man is back with v2!

A new update for VS Rhys Moon is out! This update is a demo preview of what's to come with the full v2 release!

VS Rhys Moon v2 Lore explained by the developer team:

"bf comes by a house and he trys to get in but he braked a window and i was like ay that cost 30 dollers and i thinks in my mind maby he will get out if we have a rap battel" - Rhys Moon

"okay so basically- BF comes by Rhy's house and tries to rob the house but the door is locked, so he breaks rhy's window to get in. He realizes that somebody's in the house and asks him if he's really 'that dumb' to not lock his windows. Rhy gets pissed off at him and thinks to himself "hey, maybe if I kicked his ass in a rap battle, he'll leave me alone." So that's what he did. and uhh yeah he shoots and bf because he hates him ig idk lmao" - KitCatMusic

Enjoy the V2 demo and stay tuned for the full v2 release!
